attributes.action: To keep Education, Health & Care Plans (EHCP) for SEND children and young people
attributes.additional_details:
An EHC plan is a legally binding document outlining a child or teenager’s special educational, health, and social care needs. The document has to list all of the child’s special educational needs, provision to meet each of the needs and that provision has to be specific, detailed, and quantified. 

Without an EHCP schools are not obliged to make changes or put provisions in place to support the SEND Child, and unfortunately this happens all to often.
attributes.background: Keep the EHCP's for SEND Children and young people and to reject / stop the proposal / idea made by the Labour party to scrap it.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Retain legal right to assessment and support in education for children with SEND 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711021
